traits.title: Charm
traits.description: able to persuade other NPCs and people with their winning ways

traits.title: Cunning
traits.description: having plans for any occasion and a backup after that

traits.title: Debts
traits.description: being owed favors by one or more important other people

traits.title: Deception
traits.description: capable of tricking and misleading others easily

traits.title: Fame
traits.description: being known and widely respected in their own social circles

traits.title: Family
traits.description: related to someone of greater importance or influence

traits.title: Foresight
traits.description: able to clearly predict the likely outcomes of current situations

traits.title: Friendship
traits.description: being good friends with someone important or powerful

traits.title: Gear
traits.description: possessed of high-quality cyber, weaponry, drones, or other useful equipment

traits.title: Inspiration
traits.description: able to goad others to pursue a shared goal as if it were their own

traits.title: Luck
traits.description: beyond any ordinary measure to a very noticeable degree

traits.title: Money
traits.description: being unusually wealthy for someone in their position

traits.title: Prowess
traits.description: with their physical form somehow dramatically stronger and tougher than most

traits.title: Secrets
traits.description: privy to blackmail information or valuable knowledge hidden from most

traits.title: Skills
traits.description: possessed of a rare or important skill to an unusual degree

traits.title: Stealth
traits.description: very difficult to locate or follow if they donâ€™t care to be pursued

traits.title: Ties
traits.description: linked professionally to an organization or group that is very dangerous to offend

traits.title: Violence
traits.description: either being personally fearsome or having ties to those who are

traits.title: Willpower
traits.description: driven to obtain their aim with tireless, ferocious determination

traits.title: Wisdom
traits.description: able to discern a practical path to their desires even when all is murky
